content.text:
# Flags of the Nguyễn dynasty's administrative units__disambig_1

Flags of the Nguyễn dynasty's administrative units were used since about 1868 to 1885, with 1:1 ratio.
Northern Region (北圻之省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Ha Noi.png|Hà Nội (Hà Nội tỉnh, 河內省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Son Tay.png|Sơn Tây (Sơn Tây tỉnh, 山西省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Bac Ninh.png|Bắc Ninh (Bắc Ninh tỉnh, 北寧省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Lang Son.png|Lạng Sơn (Lạng Sơn tỉnh, 諒山省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Nam Dinh.png|Nam Định (Nam Định tỉnh, 南定省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Hai Duong.png|Hải Dương (Hải Dương tỉnh, 海陽省)
Right Region (右圻之省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Thanh Hoa.png|Thanh Hóa (Thanh Hóa tỉnh, 清化省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Nghe An.png|Nghệ An (Nghệ An tỉnh, 乂安省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Ha Tinh.png|Hà Tĩnh (Hà Tĩnh tỉnh, 河靜省)
Straight Region (直圻之省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Thua Thien.svg|Thừa Thiên (Thừa Thiên phủ, 承天府)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Quang Binh.png|Quảng Bình (Quảng Bình tỉnh, 廣平省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Quang Tri.png|Quảng Trị (Quảng Trị tỉnh, 廣治省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Quang Nam.png|Quảng Nam (Quảng Nam tỉnh, 廣南省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Quang Ngai.png|Quảng Ngãi (Quảng Ngãi tỉnh, 廣義省)
Left Region (左圻之省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Binh Dinh.png|Bình Định (Bình Định tỉnh, 平定省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Phu Yen.png|Phú Yên (Phú Yên tỉnh, 富安省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Khanh Hoa.png|Khánh Hòa (Khánh Hòa tỉnh, 慶和省)
File:Flag of Nguyen dynasty's administrative unit - Binh Thuan.png|Bình Thuận (Bình Thuận tỉnh, 平順省)

* Flags of the subjects of Vietnam
* List of flags of Vietnam
References
Sources
* Peter Truhart, Regents of Nations, K.G Saur Münich, 1984–1988 , Art. «Vietnamese Dynasties/Vietnamesische Dynastien», pp. 1786–1790.
* [http://www.ttxva.net/bieu-tuong-ngoi-sao-trong-tam-thuc-viet-nam/ The star icon in Vietnamese consciousness]  (TTXVA.NET).
* Hervé Calvarin, Olivier Corre: ''L'Indochine. Étude d'Histoire vexillologique. In: Franciae Vexilla. (Bulletin de la Société Française de Vexillologie) Numéro spécial 2005, 20e anniversaire de la Société Française de Vexillologie-SFV'', , S. 89-126; 147-162. (in French).
